document.full_text: the united nations mission in ivory coast (unoci) said sunday that it had relocated some of its non-essential staff to the northern city of bouake after a number of them came under attack.
document.title: u.n. evacuates staff after attacks in ivory coast
lines_and_colors: the united nations mission in ivory coast (unoci) said sunday that it had relocated some of its non-essential staff to the northern city of bouake after a number of them came under attack.
